root: ^Hey, don't you wonder what's inside of these memories you've lost.
^See, you don't even know why you're doing this.
^Voice: You're just running from the past, it's not that you don't need is that you don't want to.
^Shut up! I don't need your vain concern..
^That way of thinking will only end in tragedy. It sure is a calming notion, but is a lie.
